title: The script used on the Pomodoro Technique website
content:
What is the script used for this logo and throughout the video on this site? [http://pomodorotechnique.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317093617/http:/pomodorotechnique.com/ "http://pomodorotechnique.com/")

It looks almost like Ballpark, but not quite.

Font: 

 Kestrel Script Italic
